dta.VehicleClassGroup¶

class VehicleClassGroup(name, classDefinitionString, colorCode)¶

Represents a group (or a set) of VehicleClasses, which are the classNames in VehicleType.

Constructor.

  • name is the vehicle class group name (e.g. All, No_Trucks)
  • classDefinitionString defines the class (either -, *, or a pipe-delimited set of vehicle classes
  • colorCode is a hex color code for drawing (e.g. #ffff00)
__init__(name, classDefinitionString, colorCode)¶

Constructor.

  • name is the vehicle class group name (e.g. All, No_Trucks)
  • classDefinitionString defines the class (either -, *, or a pipe-delimited set of vehicle classes
  • colorCode is a hex color code for drawing (e.g. #ffff00)

Methods

__init__(name, classDefinitionString, colorCode) Constructor.
allowsAll() Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes
allowsNone() Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes
allowsTransit() Returns True if the vehicle class group allows transit
getProhibited() Return a vehicle class group object that prohibits all movements
prohibitAllMovementsButTransit() Return a vehicle class group object that prohibits all movements

Attributes

CLASSDEFINITION_ALL str(object) -> string
CLASSDEFINITION_PROHIBITED str(object) -> string
CLASSDEFINITION_TRANSIT str(object) -> string
CLASSDEFINITION_ALL = 'All'¶
CLASSDEFINITION_PROHIBITED = 'Prohibited'¶
CLASSDEFINITION_TRANSIT = 'Transit'¶
allowsAll()¶

Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes

allowsNone()¶

Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes

allowsTransit()¶

Returns True if the vehicle class group allows transit

classmethod getProhibited()¶

Return a vehicle class group object that prohibits all movements

classmethod prohibitAllMovementsButTransit()¶

Return a vehicle class group object that prohibits all movements but the transit ones.
